00024                 // This is used when we create channels
00025                 // between partitions. If the congestion
00026                 // in these channels is bigger than these
00027                 // constants then the whole area is blocked 
00028                 // for placement
00029 
00030 #define  MAX_NON_BLOCK_DSTY_HOR   0.5
00031 #define  MAX_NON_BLOCK_DSTY_VER   0.5
